snippet: Hedi Slimane showed his debut women’s ready-to-wear collection Monday for the house of Saint Laurent, the hottest ticket of Paris Fashion Week that had top editors scrambling to secure access, let alone placement in the front row.
abstract: Hedi Slimane showed his debut women’s ready-to-wear collection Monday for the house of Saint Laurent, the hottest ticket of Paris Fashion Week that had top editors scrambling to secure access, let alone placement in the front row.

headline.main: Channeling the Codes of Saint Laurent
